name: Combined Worlds
description:
This is a game made for 43th Godot Wild Jam. 

This is my first game made with Godot(with a game engine in general) so I am aware of all the bugs, problems, bad movements, and I call them features so now those are fixed #gamedevelopmentiseasy

Combined Worlds

You are some guy who got trapped in a dungeon by a Dark Wizard, and with the help of the regular Wizard, you will exit this dungeon and be free.

This game features 12 different levels with some begin more a platformer and some more of a puzzle, and some both!

Controls

left and right arrow key - move left and right.

up arrow key - jump.

v or space - change artstyle.

r - reload the game.

Hints

I am aware of my poor game design and the game almost doesn't teach you anything, so if you get stuck here are some hints to solve the puzzles. 

Turn the desired level hint text color  white to reveal it. Combined Worlds Hints.

Credits

Everything is made by me expect for the background music.

And thank you for playing this little game <3
